person.persName: Minor Ellis (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Eden Ellis in Bath County, Kentucky, on April 1, 1857. Father of Mary Ellis, Nancy Ellis, and John Ellis. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Served in the 10th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from September 8, 1862, to September 17, 1863. Captured at Mt. Sterling, Kentucky, on March 22, 1863. Paroled at Camp Dennison, Ohio, May 11, 1863.
